# SwiftLink

> A powerful, free tool to shrink long links into memorable short URLs and boost brand visibility.

## Core Pages

- [Home](https://minifylinks.com)
- [Blogs](https://minifylinks.com/blog)
- [Privacy Policy](https://minifylinks.com/privacy)

## Features

- **Shortening**: Instant URL shortening with analytics tracking.

## API Usage

Our platform provides endpoints for:
- Creating short links
